page.title: 20Farm & Village Suppliers
page.content: Corn is usually delivered by special wagons which can blow the corn from the wagon into 10 or 15 tonne bins. This is called bulk delivery.The store at Hade Edge also sells many smaller items which farmers use such as roofing felt,wire netting, nails, brushes, etc. Attached to the store is the local shop and post office.They sell all types of groceries,most of which are delivered to houses and farms by wagon or van.Someone from the shop goes around to collect grocery orders.It is usual for the housewife to pay for the last order when they give their new order to the traveller. {AUTHORS:}T.Broadhead, M.Helm, K.Tyas, J.Moorhouse, S.Dawson, A.Keely, N.Thompson, E.Armstrong, A.Smith M.Tidmarsh, J.Crawshaw, R.Armitage, C.Sanderson, T.Eastwood, J.Greenwood, J.Keddy, R.Depledge.
